subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodriguez surged past Alberto Contador on the final climb to win the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España and extend his overall lead to 13 seconds.
snippet: Joaquim Rodriguez surged past Alberto Contador on the final climb to win the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España and extend his overall lead to 13 seconds.
